thread.title: UK National Grid says required to local buy gas as supplies low

title: UK National Grid says required to local buy gas as supplies low
text: March 1, 2018 / 9:22 AM / Updated 4 hours ago UK National Grid says required to local buy gas as supplies low Reuters Staff 1 Min Read LONDON (Reuters) - The UK’s National Grid said on Thursday it has a requirement to buy locational gas and requested shippers to post offers on the OCM locational market after wholesale prompt prices soared on freezing weather and outages. Earlier, the National Grid issued a ”gas deficit warning“ in response to a series of significant supply losses resulting in a forecast (for an) end of day supply deficit”. Reporting by Sabina Zawadzki; editing by Jason Neely
